channel.title: Need Active Hoster
channel.description:
The Hoster needs to be on for atleast 5 Hours aday Running the server
Details of the server : Base : Mezzyscape Revision : 562 Cache : 659
In need of a Forum Webclient :
I have the code for the Webclient But i dont kno how to add it
If you can Host Pm me or add me on Skype or Msn
Skype : ii360Modders MSN : morgan.sidle@hotmail.co.uk
Hope someone can Host :)

item.title: Need Active Hoster
item.dc:creator: @matiasmunk matiasmunk
item.description:
@matiasmunk wrote:

Wrong forum.
Nobody is fucking willing to host for you -.-
They can just host a server themselves.
If you do not have time to host a server or cbf to get a VPS.
